trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_SEQ_00<tab>Roseline needs an adventurer to destroy diremite eggs.

TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_SEQ_01<tab>Roseline recently discovered two clutches of diremite eggs by the Matron's Lethe. However, despite being a battle-tested Wood Wailer, she is repulsed by the mere sight of the eggs. Seek out and destroy the two clutches of eggs.
TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_SEQ_02<tab>You slay the unborn diremites and their enraged parents. Tell Roseline that the task is complete.
TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_SEQ_03<tab>Roseline is grateful for your willingness to dirty your hands, and laments that she cannot always rely on such timely help.
TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_ROSELINE_000_1<tab>Your willingness to assist the residents of the Twelveswood is commendable. If you have a moment, mayhap you can assist me with a delicate matter?

TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_ROSELINE_000_2<tab>My duties as a Wood Wailer include inspecting the Matron's Lethe for signs of damage or decay. It's never been a difficult task─until the other day, when I discovered several clutches of diremite eggs.

TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_ROSELINE_000_3<tab>I've no problem slaying the beasts when full-grown, but the mere sight of their eggs <var 1A 02 /var>sickens<var 1A 01 /var> me. Spare me this disgusting task and destroy the eggs.
TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_ROSELINE_000_11<tab>Would that I could always rely on a kind soul to handle such tasks!
TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_ROSELINE_000_12<tab>My training prepared me to face beasts in combat, and not once have I shirked that duty. But to lay hands upon those sticky, slimy eggs is just─
TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_ROSELINE_000_13<tab>Well, clearly you have no problems doing so. Thank you for your help, adventurer.
TEXT_SUBFST057_00378_POP_MESSAGE<tab>A diremite rushes to the defense of the eggs!
